column4: i'm in an apartment building where i'm not allowed to connect wireless routers to the wall, but i can connect them to the computer. is there any way i can use a router to allow my phone to tether to my computer for internet access?
or even just tether the router to the computer
Uh, why do you need a router for that? Just tether it to the computer. What OS does the phone have?
Then it's simple. Settings -> Wireless Networks -> Tethering and Portable Hotspot -> USB Tethering -> Enable
